message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
You can have less, I'll take the bigger share this time
I'm not willing to take less than 50% of the total, let's try again!
I'm willing to compromise, but I think I deserve a bit more this time.
You're not getting more, I'm taking the bigger share again
You're not convincing me to give you more, I'm holding firm on my previous offer!
You're losing ground with each round, I'm taking advantage of the inflation!
You're getting desperate, I'm taking the last big share
You think I'm desperate, but I'm just trying to get a fair deal!
You're running out of time, I'm taking the last big share!
You're going to regret this, I'm taking the last big share
You're bluffing, but I'm not falling for it!
This is my last offer, take it or leave it!
You're not getting away with it, I'll take the last penny
Fine, you win this time, but I'm still getting the last penny!
